of a neverending virtual cycle of meaningless struggle
but poet, philosopher, scholar, and you of the third domain
what right do we, as immortal beings who transcend the laws of time if carefully tended to, have to complain
truth
reality
may become... minor... to he of the minor realm
for what will a groundstuck penguin reiterate his inability to fly?
for what?
when our penguin children may live in world where flying penguins may happen
if you flap your tiny wingies enough that is
oh but am i again out of place?
pardon my inadequacy, my sad lack of the understanding the
"Complex Human Condition"

title: friend
body:
friend
it has been so long
i wonder if you still listen to our songs
i know you're tired and need some time
it's not like you've pushed me to the side
so it's not so hard
because
you will come back
and tell me all about
those new ideas
those new songs
those new friends
you've been with
because you're my friend
so i'll check my schedule
free every weeknd
just in case
i'll keep writing
melancholic letters
let you know
of our favorite bands
of our favorite series
of all our favorite inside jokes
of everything you're too busy to know about
because you're my friend
and I wi-
should wait for you

title: A Love Story
body:
Youth's faint light
She suppressed it all into a seductive spark
Then expressed it's flame within my forge
She spoke to me in British
And danced to me in Spanish
She told me she had lost track of time
She told me she was a mess and needed a place to stay
My arms betrayed my core and became warm for the night
The night was long and that was when
I started to lose track of time as well
The city lights were gone
The stars got closer
The moon came along and sang to us
We fell asleep to the lullaby
On each other's arms
On each other's care
On each other's trust
On each other's time
We woke up the next day
And once more we spoke and danced
And the moon again came and sang
And so on...

But then
My ecstasy took its tool and left me
How many years have passed?
"Who are you?" She asked
My Dolores
My one love story
How many days have you given me
How many days have I been stricken
With those eyes and with that tone
She worded thoughts I dare not to remember
How long has it been?
No my love pardon me
Let us speak and dance
I took her arm
She shivered in pain
Fell to the ground
I lend her my hand
She trembled in fear
So my eyes met hers
And so I saw the reflection of an old friend
My Keeper
My Guard
My Knight
The monster within my core
When did I get so careless
When did you escape?
My love!
This is not me
My fire!
Where
Where have you gone?
Where are you?
I looked for her
Tirelessly
On the first day
The city lights returned
On the second day
The stars and the moon abandoned me as well
On the third day
I was old and exhausted
On the fourth day
I remembered my name and was again myself
On the fifth day
I promised I would never fall in love again

title: Warstruck
body:
Warborn
Warthorn
Warstruck
A sword thrust
A bullet wound
A missing limb
For a worn nation
To the unknown king
I spill my blood
Enough to forget whose blood makes the river

Forever a sin
Forever at brink
Of destruction
My love for you
Is never at your hands' reach
Yet always at a weapon's reach

title: a killing blow after spring solstice
body:
is there ever someone to kill
someone to point the gun at
the heart at
the stare at
a soul to carve out of flat ice
a soul to know compromise and to promise demise

the voice tells me that 
"on our kingdom it is sin for sin
unless there's a queen for each king"

And I weep
Because she's been staring at me for a while and
My heart bleeds
Because soon, she says
"I shall reap of the seed I've planted on the blood stained snow"
She speaks of a recurring dream
As she pierces my shield with those eyes
And lacerates my flesh with those claws
And all bleeds
All rightfully bleeds
To water the garden of the Deceiver

title: Ten Days of Woe and one of Bliss
body:
ten days of woe,
and one of bliss
to fill my thirst i feed on this crisp yet sweet flavor
a dive into the unknown substance within my core
OH IT SHIVERS!
as the breeze crosses the river within these mountains
the voice speaks
and at the peak of my climax the image of wonder crosses my mind
-the ninth lost verse written by the ninth missing nymph
on olympus dismay
the unexpected rhyme emerges from the dead
and joins the table amidst laughs and thunderous claps
oh lord
i have preached for these days

title: pretty fools
body:
Babe
Let's walk to the shrine
Hold my hand trust my vibe
Look at the sky
Never see me lie
She never sees my lies
She only sees my smiles
I think I've got my prey
Let's walk to the shrine
Pray to a God or two
Make a song or two
Make a promise or two
Break one or two
Babe take a sip become my fool
Let's walk to the shrine
Break a light or more
She thinks I want to see her true
But I just want her nude
Oh she never sees my lies
She's my own pretty fool
With pretty blind eyes
(she only sees me smile)
She's got a wide bright smile
(but mine is brighter)
(I know my game)

Let us walk to shrine
Keep me
Awake 
Keep me on
Top
Because
You see 
I never sleep
When I'm 
All
By 
Myself

Let's walk to the shrine

title: singularities
body:
At last

At peace

The debris align

Together they form the seven pointed star

At last my home shows all that I've sowed

Reach me midnight God

Take me whole 

Drip no essence from those lips

Your body is none and my soul is drunk

In slumber and depravity

We shall connect with an ethereal touch onto infinity

I shall break away from this singularity

Fade away into collectivity

And truly become

Singular

title: sundays
body:
I usually find it hard at sundays
To breeze through as I usually do
The emotions that emerge feel bullet proof
Or perhaps I'd rather betray my "emo" self

But truth be told I'd rather stay home
Stay alone
Stay sober
Because I'd rather not go
And just fall Asleep
So monday comes
So I regain purpose
Yeah I walk a lonely road
Deprived of fears
But flooded by dry tears
It is my choice no matter what excuses
You or I
Try to come up with
So if you ever read these words
Retract your warmth and walk away
Thank you

title: Unsheathe
body:
Golden plates at our table
Silver spoons sink in
A crystal glass of wine
To poison this river
Such a flavorless youth
Such a flavorless death

So

Hide your soul
No moons and suns follow you today
Relinquish the essence and go higher
Higher
And even higher

Beneath your soul
He knows who you are and where you live
He knows your sins and all you hold dear
His claws reach higher than you think

Unsheathe your soul
Abandon form and become singular
Let yourself go
Further
Further and a bit further
Reach the depths of the void and consume the essence of truth
He reaches high
But you reach
INFINITY

title: is anyone there?
body:
Do I fall asleep
If the night fails to fall
And the sky remains flat blue
Do I stay awake 
Forever in my bed
Here by myself
Stuck in my twisted mind

In my dream
The moon came down
And devoured
All the nightmares
Then it rose and it found it's place among the stars
Oh no I think I miss the face of my lover
Oh I miss my dreams and my nightmares
And
It feels like my bed is shrinking
And I feel like I'm running out of time
And I don't know what to do anymore
Is anyone there?

title: sailing soul
body:
On darker days
I've seen clearer faces
And I've been a step away
From reckoning and reaching
The epiphany of a lifetime

It is safe as a creed
To seed my belief
In something greater
Than my essence
Yet vagueness defies its grace

So I must sail
To the unknown
A song is sang
And a legend is born
But a soul is lost
To what lies beyond
A storm is fought
A soul fails
A soul is nothing a but a soul
And a body of matter is nothing above
So what is a soul to the above
And what are these words to what's below
A soul can only wonder
A soul can only dream
A soul can only sail
Eternally
On his sea of thoughts

title: a stormy sight to delight
body:
Have you seen the skies
Have you been in flight
Are you a day in the night
A stormy sight to delight
A flat cloud stated
An internal strife in disguise
Will you grab these hands this time
I've been here by your side
But you never see me even in the light
There's garden cage inside my mind
You've seen it all but the flame
In my heart
There it thrives
All I ever wanted
Was to glide
On your back and sleep for days
Have you seen these skies
And what lies beyond?

title: dead days
body:
Dead days

     A heat haze

    Dry skin and a dry mouth

          Thin words

                  And a mourn will

               Neither open or shut

My eyes seek

                               A lap to weep on

   As the wither takes me

        Dead days are these

title: A Greater Domain
body: Another day A dormant domain Wishing the flames Would rage and save us all Another day A dormant domain A cursed youth A locked cage A day more Another day A greater domain I may fail and collapse I may dive and never emerge I may fly and never land And may rephrase if you allow me to stay Another day It's a greater day A love in disdain It's a porcelain taste of a distant domain Now tell me do you stay? Oh darling when do you stay? Hey darling do you ever stay? I wish you'd stay Another day A cruel domain A wingless angel Seeks my gaze Another day I dream on

title: these days
body:
All withers

All dies

Eventually

But actually

If you take a look beneath
You'll see
That there's still people in need
Of an everlasting sin
To breed
A pretentious seed
Into the
Already dim future of their kin

He's just a kid
But
He's so bound to say
"I pray for the end of these days"
While his friends
Violate
The ninth commandment
Countless times
Ten thousand faces
They save
For the upcoming trial
On the day after the sane mutate and reshape
The same face they always wore
Monsters and primates
Fight to the death
Oh God you're too wild these days
I question if you're even there these days
Seems like no one is aware these days
All withers
All dies
Eventually

title: Murder Murder Murder Murder Murder Murder Murder Murder
body:
Murder
Murder
Murder
Murder
Everyday
My life's insane
Called it a game
Easier to sleep
Nah **** that
If you see this man
Call 911
He's the Monster
Winter's gone
Summer's dawn
Here to bring him home
My old friend
My only friend
My lonely friend
My mirror friend
Take my hand
To the land
Where I can actually see my **** hands
This stench fades
When you're around
The rotten light is no more
No lies will cover the sky
(Found out I've been living a lie)
(For awhile I'd been blind to the light)
(Just to realize
Hey I miss it when I had to cry)
(Now I had to decide)
(Which mask to put on)
**** this **** I'm out
Winter take the wheel

I'm no longer one
But I'm no longer gone
I'd hoped you'd come for me
But the sun is gone
And the night is torn
Apart by my soulless lust
And
I think this is all for
You
Oh I think this is all for
You
Oh I think I've been confused
Oh I hope you'll bring yourself
To trust me
One last time
Rush through my rotten
Blood
Stream

title: The Devil's Speech
body:
Sit
Tight
Hold the bible in one hand
And your lover on the other one
Honestly
I hope I break those bonds

Now
Consider this
A world of light
Not real light
I speak of that soft light
You used to have at your bedside
To make you happy and disguise
The lack of presence
Of omnipotence
The abundance of darkness
The voidless sparkful darkness
Rose me thoughtful
At first, it was awful
And then my gospel
And I started thinking the Father had been lying to us all
Felt so alone
So I called the Monster
Within this cage you call heart
Asked it to guide me
Sought the answers the light would not provide us
I risk being at loss
At times
Why am I lying
Every night
After the farce passes
But unlike you
I know my story
And again unlike you
I know yours as well
I delve into the reality's content
You delve into the contentless
Into the needlessly abstract
You delve into clothes, into the material side
You delve into Mister Cool Boy and Miss Cool Girl
And hope one day you'll be a Mister Cool Boy or Miss Cool Girl
Who knows you might even be the one they bow for
King of the pack
Pay homage
You commoner
Reach the nearest Mask Generator 2K
Reshare the share to feed your lonely insignificance
With the delusional idea
That your little actions served to give some kind of meaning to your small existence
Yeah
Now you know
Go ahead and cry once everyone's left the party
It's "okay"
I cry too
For different reasons
Whichever path you chose
You'll find pain
But would you not prefer
Adding some purpose to the pain
Child
Let go of her hand
Bring the bible
We'll go through the pages
And learn from the greatest parade of soft lights
Come with me
I wish to break you down
Take you down
With me
Down town
Bound to nothing
But the forge within our brain
Come on now
Let us be one again
And let us sink into the voidless dark

title: summer boys
body:
The summer boys
And the summer girls
Danced around
Oh Lord
They dance around
They see my blood
They see my soul
But fuck this one
We've had this talk
The night before
When you had your song
Now you've been gone
And now you're back
And now you want to take it back
The throne you left
Man now what's that about
Are we not
The blind ones
The sheep ones
Cause you're the alpha wolf
And you have seen
From the mountain
The shepherd and his son
They made us dance
They made us sing
A song of faith
Watch us dance
Watch us dance
Watch us dance
Look how we dance
Ain't it all
A sight to recall
When you're old
And alone
Cause you said
-No-
To the shepherd
And left his son
Out on the storm
Inside your mind
Fuck you
Fuck you
Fuck you and your self-righteous hypocritical ass
BAAAAA We hope you die
And find yourself surrounded
By nothing but your voices
Hear me
Fear saves
Gluttony
For wisdom
For truth
Kills
Slowly.

But who are we
Around the bonfire?

title: StarMan
body:
Is all this nothing
But my disturbed mind's conjecture

See

I fail to understand
The ways things work
Here
And every time I try
Hard
To understand their words
I only get hurt and feel even more
Lost

The freedom disguised
Binarity of Choice
The seven billion voices
Each one of them
Strangely sounding
The same simplistic rhythm
The sun
The moon
The trees
The waves
The clear summer sky
The set scenery
For the eternal act
Of love and hatred
Of faith and despair
Of light and darkness
Of life and death
Presents me on a stage I do not
Comprehend
I don't want to live
And I'm not sure anymore
About ending my life
Either darkness or light
Resides inside
My thoughts remain
Unchanged
I know it's all in vain
To live
And hope
For a better day
But then death halts my train
Of thoughts of suicide and reconciles
My soul with the vessel
That is supposedly mine
And we return
To verse one
To once more to play our part

I wish to run
Far
Far
Far away
Cross the cosmos
Happily skipping from star to star
Until I can see
With my own eyes
The third choice

title: meaningless words
body:
And of all the words we spoke
Only one retained meaning
And echoed in the sky we could not see but feel
Carrying an embedded promise
Neither of us is sure to keep

Meaningless evenings and nights
Blindly chasing after countless sweet laughs
We've gone and restored
The clarity within our hearts
The sweet insanity within our minds
Through the lack of meaning
We're curing our souls

But

Dangerous and cold
Are these roads we walk
And flawed is the way we talk
Either we make it to spring
Or freeze to death
I hope we'll be able to look up to the sky
And see that word
With eyes we've never seen before

How many evenings
How many nights
How many meaningless words
Until we can afford meaning
Until we can see that word

I ask of you
Lover
Have patience

title: promises, endings, and beginnings
body:
In the middle of the night
A gentle breeze
Walks through
The valleys of my mind
Reminding me of a promise
I once made
To the child I once was

It pains me
That I'm forced to tell you
"I might not make it to winter"
I'm sorry
I'm sorry I disappointed you
I'm sorry I had to hurt you
I'm sorry I could not make your dreams come true
I'm sorry for all the promises
I might not be able to keep

I will not blame it on time
Because I never really grew up
And I will not blame it on them
Because they never really knew

I shall take full responsibility
With my heavy dirty soul

I might not
Keep my promises
But I will not
Take you with me
To the land I seek

Oh Lady of darkness
If you must take me
Take me and reign me above
But spare this child
And make him a man
Give him purpose
Give him a wife
And give him a child
Give him a way to live a dream
Not a life
Because so I tried
And I ended up
Making a little boy cry
Every night a little smile went by
Reminding of a life
We could only dream of

I might not make it to winter
But my end shall be the beginning
Of a new and brighter future

title: Misguided Youth
body:
Now
Here we are
The misguided youth
On the lost word
The pink canvas
Of the preached horizon
Slowly turns
Bloody red
As it comes
To our meeting
On the shore
Of enlightenment
And I've been here
At the shore
Screaming my name
For a while now

Oh neighbor
Will you not
Come outside
And show me how
To float
Adrift this world

Oh
Our minds' disturbed
And our ways' distorted
That's all I saw
Halfway
Man, I saw it all
It is all about love
And about our faults
And I
Midway between
Myself and you
Believe
(Hoping I'm still allowed to)
That it's time
To offer my blood
As sacrifice
For the new world
So they'll let me die
For the lost word
We once dreamt of

title: Monster - Epilogue
body:
And I tell you
Even though it still rushes through my bloodstream
It seems like the darkness within
Has found its light
And it is all clear now
The secrets
The freaks
The murders

And if you never understood
The words I spoke
On the day misunderstood the dark
I spare you the fear
Of becoming me
So you can see the sky
With hopeful eyes

The blood never dried

And for the things I saw
And for the things I heard
I'll name my hero
And allow to you dream
Of what I mean
His name his Truth
(Sometimes I call her Death)

And you'd be surprised to know
That god never replied
Or perhaps he did
Perhaps my doubts
Were all but lies
Perhaps I even knew
back then..
Who knows?
You?
Him?
He's dreaming
Soon you will be, as well
As for me
I'll keep creating these doubts
And redeeming
My greed

The blood never dried

And you
What did you do
Once the monster cried
One surely asked
Do monsters cry?
Had he been saved
What would have been?
Of the dreams
He chose not to dream
Well..
Seemingly
He floats
To this day
Adrift that river
Downstream
Somewhere uncertain
Yet certain
To provide answers

title: Spring, warmth, and sunshine
body:
Oh core and forge
Fuse and blaze aloud
It is time to sing
These songs of spring
Open the doors
Welcome that sunshine!
Into our souls!
That warmth will
Surely
Guide us
Towards
A better day
Of better clouds and better thoughts

Of darker clouds
Of realistic thoughts
My world is darkness
And my God is the devil
He takes the pen at midday
To midnight
To leave me lost
At dawn
"Here take a look at paradise"
"Learn how to fall"
"And I'll show you love"

And look
He tells me that
I'm a death in reverse
A life in recurse
A curse at its source
And he grabs my pen
He writes these words

As we dance around the bonfire

And I think
It is time
For sleep
Find me
Wherever I may be
In the morning

title: Me
body:
If the stars ever fall
You'd be surprised
To see me smile
For the first time

But
Shun me not
Oh friend
Oh stranger
HOPE
Betrays me
So I have to
Find refuge
In hatred
Where I can justify
My loneliness
Where I can only
HOPE
For darkness
Pain and sadness

Down the pit I go
And I'm taking my pillow with me
If I never get up
I'll never fall again
And that's how it works
Now you know me

title: pills and shrinks
body:
What have you seen of my brain?
What do you know of my pain?
I find it insane
To believe
These pills
And shrinks
Whoever they may be
Would kill my sadness
And bring me happiness
I find it hard
Rather hard
To believe
I'm not alone
How could I not be
Something as complex
As this
Could never be deciphered

We're all broken
Because we do not see
How alone we are
And expect these pills and shrinks
To piece us together
Only you
Oh stranger
Only you
Know where each piece fits
Please find that strength
And fight yourself
Until your shelf
Is entirely yours

title: Wild Thoughts
body:
I am dead inside

I mean
I've seen it all
After I break down
We all gather
Around the bonfire
We put blames
And pick names
For each one
Each hollow one
I mean
Quantity does not equal quality
And I know from personal experience
I mean
We know
Behold
All these souls
None real
None substantial

Death
The real one is dead

Lack of introspection
Of understanding
Lead the thoughts to revolt
And seek their own freedom
These words are wild you know
But what do you know?
I do not write for you
You know
I write for me
To record memories
But somehow these words
Fall like this
Some less savvy
Call it poetry
They mock me
Ahah
I hate poetry
Misleading words
Unrealistic thoughts
But again

Who am I?

Around the bonfire

title: Forgive me oh sleeping beauty
body:
Above the clouds
Above the stars
My love for you
Lies determined to last
This word forced itself
Into this stream
Oh no
Worry not of words
Oh sleeping beauty
Words hurt
So dream
Of sounds of silence
I will protect
Your fragile figure
From these monsters
They walk among us
Disguised as hearts
But it is far too obvious
I cannot ignore
I do see
Oh sleeping beauty
I do see all
And I will soon meet yours
Your fragile true heart
Yes I must be awake
Because I do see all and beyond
The stars and galaxies
I rightfully am to land judgement
Oh princess hang in there
I must destroy

Indeed
I must destroy
You
This filthiness that runs through my bloodstream!
I'm taking over
I'm slitting my wrist
I'm drowning my lungs
I'd rather die
Than go to war
Forgive me father
Forgive me mother
Forgive me brother
And leave me lover
For you lack existence
I'm taking over

title: To: Mask Cracker
body:
Mask cracker
My foreign laughter
What brings you here?
Worry not!
This?!
Is no sack of masks
Only a flask of tears
All mine of course!

From all the fear

I'd dare not to feel
One that's not myself
One like you would know
One that fell from the shelf
What shelf?
Oh dear
Oh my
What lies?
What denial?
Please sit!
And have a cup of tears
With us
With me!
Trust me
I'm one
Unshaken!

Stay!
And have this drink with me
I will be worth it
And well fit
Into your arms

Please stay
And never leave
Let me breathe
please

title: Live for me
body:
see you now
Cold dark void
Withering voice
Wrap your soul
Around my pain
Meet the hope
You've made me find
Inside
Kill darkness
Walk not the path
I've chosen
To walk
Cry
And write about
The clouds are light
And the sun is bright
You must not question it
Let it be true
These lies
Make our lives
Oh friend
I need your arms
Warm
Not cold
Is it selfish
To ask you
Live for me

title: Gears of Soul
body:
Oh stranger
Hold these hands
Warm me to the core
Flame the forge and have me born
Once more
I hope you call me home
When I fall among the mourning ones

Oh failures
Why must you haunt me
Allow me to meet my lover
She sleeps tightly in peace
Let her be
Let us be
Set us free

Oh savior
Breath in
Within
My sins
Set me ablaze
I must rocket launch
To the stars
And grab my choices
And revolt
Against the voices

Oh stranger
(Oh lover)
Oh failures
Oh savior
Sing along

title: Red Love Locked Eyes
body:
Red love-locked eyes
When do you fly
Away from your disguise

Shining lone rose
What else
Have those eyes seen
(I wonder)
If nothing but his form

I'd hold your hand
And love you to no end
"Just the way you are"
The words you seek

But unfortunately

Blood soaked lisianthus
I laugh and crack
Madly
And ask myself
Whose greed
Bleeds you
To this extent?
For you'd never reply
Voiceless flower
For you'd never allow
Your true petals to fly
Along my breeze

Oh father
Oh lord
Oh god
Oh forces
Please have me done
The fallacy within
Our hearts,
Now cards
Is maddening

title: Blindly Recursing
body: Dark clouds Loud voices Scatter It is time to wipe Away The mourning It is time to Welcome The morning Last night was extensive And expensive on my Emotions It's atrocious How deep I fell All the voices And their motives Forced On my Choices Blindly Recursing Endlessly Reminiscing on a meaningless past Timeless warrior Find your way To my heart Invade And erase All The darkness I sing Eternally Joyful To your grace

title: time and spilled blood
body:
Though you called my name
Do you really know
Who it was that you saw?

Who's at fault
Now
Do not run
See
This is blood
I spill for you
Now
Would you spill for me
The way I spilled for you then
Are the time games confusing?
Perhaps we could blame time then, now
But what about when we didn't have time then
Compared to now that we have time to cry
And
From time to time love a little
Is it hard to follow me?
Will you ever let me walk in this darkness
By myself?
Now see how
We're talking of the future
Neglecting this broken present
And avoiding lessons from the past
See
How you failed to see
I'm running out of blood
It is all on you
Carry all
This guilt
This feel
Of my blood drying on your hands
Yes
Before now becomes another neglected past
And the future becomes a broken present
Don't fake it
Break it
Make it right
Be free from my oddity

And breathe
See
It's all easier

title: Go To War, Son
body:
Sought wisdom
Preached hope
Saw doom
All the love has been spent
So I leave you this song

Son

Feed mother
Feed brother
Kill another
Go to war and crawl son

Machine gun
Sword
Pick one
Ask who to kill

Smoke
Blood
Disease
See through
And live
Guilt-free 
And breathe
Son

Love us now
Love us then
Weep no more
Save the repent
To when
Your breath is spent

Feed mother
Feed brother
Kill another one

And once it is all spent
Carry all
But this song

title: i am infinite
body:
I float myself
And grab our hope
With these hands
I called mine

I cross the rivers
Across the mountains
-Countless mountains-
-Some less mine than others-

-Ferocious hunger-
They cry for more
"Bleed for us once more"
I slit my wrist
And let it be
Replaced
By someone else's

I am infinite
That's how they taught me to think
And with each death
My voices widen

So 

Kill me woman
I shall rise 
On the mourning
Following my burial

Weaker than used I to be
Yet plentier than I used to be

title: Meaning
body:
It's all pointless
So I concluded
Yet the thought
Crossed my mind
The need of meaning
And this greedy ego of mine
To avoid the realization of the meaningless

Were I to live for something other
Than my species
Were I to defile this order
And seek something within myself
Instead of something within ourselves...

The idea to betray my brothers seemed
Easy and immediately
Its breeze cleared my mind from all the guilt

Were I to live within my own world
Instead of living within the "real" world
Which presents nothing but
A faint never seen dying light
To the vast cosmos...

Were I to live within my own world...

Were I to breathe for nothing else
Than my own ideals...

Were I to play this game alone...

And were I to prove my point to the world...

Would I be able to die with a smile of pride on my face?

So I concluded
He who seeks meaning
Has no choice
But to walk a path paved in lies

title: the deceived child stood still and cried
body:
Please tell me there's another way
Because I'm starting to fade away
Do I really have no choice?
I feel like I'm being forced
To live in a world I disapprove

At eighteen
I was supposed to get ready for twenty
But at twenty 
I feel like I've been tremendously deceived

Hold my hands and tell me I'm still alive
I can no longer differentiate between one and another
And if love is what I need
Please find me a lover
I've grown unmovable

And it's all too readable
I expected more adventure
Yet I'm to play nothing but a pawn
Is it my fault?
But why should I live for you?
If all you do
Is all I disapprove

Why do I have no choice?
Can't I go back?
Can I not go the other way?
The path you've hidden from...
Oh sweet paranoia you say

Should I just stay here?
Waiting 
For something to push me forward
Along this road you present me with
Are you not lying?
Is this really the only way?
Are you really not hiding something from me?
I'm starting to doubt you
I'm starting to doubt myself

title: Storm Yielder
body:
Storm yielder
Sky ravager
My hero holds truth on both hands
And walks fiercely trough all lands
He's to fly
Not to cry
Death deprived
Yet never alive
Born to fight
Undefeated
Undeceived
Free of meanings
Yet breeder of meanings
A spark of energy
On the land of slumber
Loud thunder
Striking brutally
Onto the anvils
Inside your heads
Unstretched
And determined
To break steel
He flies
Lyrically unbound
Yet lyrically beautiful
Storm yielder
Sky ravager

title: Synergy
body:
And I saw the face of god
Amidst the swamp of souls
The forces collided around his corpse
The constant love-making of the mourning ones
A prelude of death amidst the living ones
The attachments detached and reattached
In response to the screams
Of those who preached hope
And reached the corpse's synergy
Infusing with infinity
The remaining smiles'
Durability
A dream that is never meant to end
"Defying nature we long for judgment"
They cried silently
For the sake of those who could not cry
A lie hidden deep within my heart
Pushed me outwards
From the scene
And reattached my concepts of dream
And reality
Until these words
Wildly
Flew from my fingers

title: Dolls and Dogs
body:
The dolls and dogs
Of flawed mind
Called my name
And landed judgment
Upon my words
The dolls and dogs
See not the horizon
We hide and preach
Blindingly fantastic
We find the truth
Mesmerizing
And choose to see it as
Fiction
The friction
That comes from my words - our words
Comes not from me

title: Spiritual Cocaine
body:
The odds of being
Wronged by the one you love
Become too high
When you start feeling with your heart
Instead of with your brain

Flaws
Become meaningless
We become blinded
Naivety takes over
We start driving a car without
Headlights
All becomes dark
And your only light
Becomes this stranger
That you think you know
That you believe
Is the perfect person
The one that will save you
From this shit hole

It's a wicked light
Doesn't only hinder your vision
Takes over all your senses
Cocaine
Spiritual cocaine
A cursed gift from God
That came along the gift of wisdom
Disguised...as peace

It's a weapon
A weapon we use everyday
And the power of this weapon
Relies on it's inability to kill
It eats you on the inside
Until the only thing that's left
Is your desire to die.

title: Another Warrior That Never Stood Up
body:
The birds flew north
Across the mountain
Pierced the cold wind
And retrieved the stolen reason
Of their flight

And then

They came to me unscattered
And presented me with thoughts
I could not perceive yet
I could interiorize

They taught me how to fall
And how to crawl when I fall
And to never blame it on my flaws
Even when the judge calls my name

And then

Those birds flew south
To the southern pole
Where a southern cold
Fallen from hope
Remained frozen
Nothing had it stolen
It had only given up
On crawling over
The slippery only ground it ever knew

They promised they'd bring me a friend
A friend to play with
A friend to play words with
A love to replace the missing gear
And watch over my defenceless rear

Another warrior that never stood

title: The Sinful Summer Club
body:
You're magical
It's like now we fail to fall
Unless we're down to fuck

Now let me seek your flaws

See I was born to feel
And now you're bound to me
Feel me down
And I'll feel you upstream 
Where you keep your secrets

See we're sinning tonight
For the sake of givin' some meaning
To what's left of us

Become one with me now
Transcend what's hard to see
And live up to the promises we made

Inflate, deflate, repeat the cycle
We're born to make what's not to fake

See let me read your flaws
Warm summer spirit
Perfection within imperfection
Reflect my confessions
In your leisure
Be my queen
And fall asleep within my kingdom

title: Thoughts of glass
body:
Destiny
Humanities
Games of philosophies
All seems to rush indiscriminately
Towards a future made of glass
Perhaps the masses would learn from the past
If the fear of breaking glass
Were not so hard to repress

My words
These words
Are not mine
They're probably our words
However they reach my ears 
Easily
For I do not posses the
Masses' squealing reasoning

Yet who am I
With no life, to
Provide
Insight on this fight
-These cries
-Lies in disguise
Yes! Teach me how to bind
On the inside
On the outside

My mind is alive
Help me kill it
Grab the bible
I'll grab the silence

Wait.
Perhaps...

Such a lapse
To think I'd let myself...
Seduced by this song
-Those rhymes
-Their laughs in disguise
No! You will not bind my mind and blind it
I'll repeat these rhymes
Until time finds its way to line me up the morgue

Mark these words
I won't allow the stars to collide

title: a chaotic chemical reactin of faith and reality
body:
Once upon a time
The dark sides turned bright
Only to ridicule
The wishes we chose to visualize
Then God came down with his lone forgotten son
And purged the darkness from this world
However ignorantly he purged the blinding light as well
And so the rotten truth emerged
Unmasking their disguises and causing their demise
Consequently
All men became gods and forgotten sons of mad gods
Freedom brutally conceited turned chaos
The sons followed their fathers' steps
To become memory once more
Maddening frenzy erupted and collided
With what once was known as morals
The lovable ten commandments became nothing
But rubble of the lost era
No man dared to lift those from the rubble
In fear of angering nature's law
Would be the fall of Men
Once more if the new Gods were to fall
Although ruthless and violent
It's charm seduced man
With what they believed was the right choice
The freedom call
All they ever wanted
Brought them meaning
Yet disaster
No more sky pleading
No more life leaking
Each soul became one with the body
And each body became one with it's nature
Consequently
Chaos lived on

title: Blessed Rain
body:
O blessed rain!
O slayer of ten thousand gods and dragons!

O!

Wash me downstream
And wake me up
From this dream!

O salted water!
Bleach my soul
From all thoughts and colors
Unleash my soul
From all joy and pride

O!

Bless these rivers with your love!

O!

Ruthlessly you've answered my call...
This lone wolf longs slumber
Allow no light to trespass those clouds
Firmly shut we celebrate the age of darkness
Silently laid we watch the fall of Men
By she who lays in darkness
By she who calls the rain

O! Blessed rain!
Ruthless and violent is your love!

title: save me
body:
So that I can see before I can no longer see
I am allowing the heat
To reach my sleeves

So that I can see before I can no longer see
I'm willing to believe
There's a world besides this sea

So that I can see these walls
Before I can no longer see these hands
I'm willing to make a stand
To make you understand the life we pretend

So you can be free
So you can see me
So you can break steel
So you can amaze me
I'm willing to let you read this
So you can save me

title: If I ever fall
body:
If I ever fall 
To depths unknown to us
I hope these words will be clear enough
As a trail of lost words in lost verses

Know that
My heart never meant to welcome closure
Somehow I lost track of the line
Between good and evil
Perhaps, blamable on my lack of faith?

Regardless 
Of how long it may take
I hope you never give up on me
As I never gave up on you
As I never gave up on loving you
As I never gave up on believing your hopeful verses

If countless lives are lost
I hope you'll forgive me
I hope you'll be able to see
That I never wanted to kill
No one but the monster inside of me

The place where I hide
Is made of ice
Ice that once composed the flowing waters
Of the rich mud-less rivers
That once ran my mountainous consciousness

If I ever fall 
To depths unknown to me
On that day
I hope the sky is clear
And the sun strong enough
To light your way towards me

I hope your heart becomes greater than mine
I hope your faith becomes stronger than that sunlight
Strong enough to turn evil humble
I hope you find me.

title: smiles and utopias
body:
I see these lights
I see these smiles
And yet nothing flies inside of me

How many hallowed days have passed
Without my hallowed side
Why do I fail to read these songs
And fly with them
Even if shortly...

An escape of hope
Masked by consumerism
Would cover my hunger for hatred
And make me one of them
If these memories were never
Triggered by, perhaps, my lone ideals of a distant Utopia
Carried by my lone lingering pride

How many days have passed
Without my duskless side

title: Reign Me Above
body:
In the darkness where she lies
I find myself empty
Of all desires

In the darkness where she lies
I kindly reconcile
With my suicidal side

In the darkness where she lies
I bind myself quietly
Within my demise

In the darkness we praised
The false light eluded
Everything our mediocre form concluded

In the darkness we dreamt of
All the dark... we were afraid of
Regardless.. of her claws

In the darkness where she lies
Ruthless and violent is her love
Take me

And reign me above

title: Monster
body:
This filthiness
Rushes through my bloodstream
How many secrets do I keep
How many freaks do I keep
Inside where I ask myself every night
How many murders have I plotted

Do you truly understand these words?
The blood is now blurring my view
But did you see the things I saw
On the last day of spring
I think I took a trip
Downstream where I keep my fears
But my memory is blurry
Alas
Everything is blurry

The blood is becoming thicker

The things I saw
The things I heard
I wonder if you see them
I wonder if you hear them
At night when you try to sleep
I miss sleeping
The peace I sacrificed is now my enemy

I wonder if God ever sleeps
These questions feel common to me
These are the only responses I receive
You see my life is ruled on these doubts
I create to give me some meaning
And some redeeming
To my guilt

The blood dries on my skin

Tell me
Do you fear me?
Or
Do you read me?
Do you see these monsters?
Do you hear these voices?
Could these hands be cleared?
Could these doubts be cleared?
Is my mind deceived?
Would you wipe these tears?
Would you relieve my guilt?
Would you save or kill this creature?

title: The Hero
body:
When we were children
The reasons we needed to change the world were simple
Nothing stopped our sporadic revolutions

However
Somehow time left us stranded out on the shore of growth
Only to find out a world bigger than us
Yet this child realizes himself and tries
To reverse and transverse these verses
Suppressed by the oppression he rises
One-handed
He transcends transcendence
And reaches the heavens
He kills God
He kills Satan
And brings down their heads and declares
"The skies have fallen
Rise and take it"
The locals enclose
The locals reject (with regret)
The hero's words
And so this hero realizes
The irony of these verses
These were never meant to rhyme
In the order they were meant to
Because whatever they were meant to
Was solely used as a distant horizon
To captivate these distant words

Now you ask me
What happened to this hero?
And I'll gladly answer you
He became a poet.

title: The Slow Death | The Art Of Nature
body:
The wind blows
The water flows
The threes grow
The spaceships fly

The land morphs
The sea sprouts
The sky cloaks
The chip shrinks

The lion hunts
The bisons run
The vulture waits
The missiles hit

The clock alarms
The morning sounds
The coffee smell
The slow death

The clock screams
The night comes
The sea revolts
The slow death

The clock breaks
The end comes
The earth revolts
The slow death

The clock laughs
The truth comes
The sky revolts
The slow death

The wind blows
The water flows
The threes grow
The man loves

title: doubt and terror
body:
Sometimes
I feel like peeling my skin off
To be sure there's only
Flesh
Blood
And bone inside
So I can reconcile
With my suicidal side
We've been in places
In dark places
We had no space
To doubt or restart
But sometimes
I feel like I need
To go far enough
To be strong enough
To cross the border
And bring him something terrifying
To prove him something horrifying
I terrorize the insides of my mind
In order to collide the opposites
And have them behave in constant fear
Of mutual destruction and despair
But still, sometimes
I feel like peeling my skin off
To be sure
There's nothing terrifying
Residing on the inside

title: Teen Bliss
body:
Ever since you've been gone
My inner core seems to startle
Upon the image of your face
For it does not know
Who could be this creature
In constant departure
The paradox each memory represents
Your lips
Your hair
Your voice
Your stare
I cannot forget
Yet
I fail to remember
The who we're burying
In concrete
Along bliss
With deep grief
Teen bliss I fail to forget
Deep grief I fail to forget
The empty canvas of your face
I fail to forget
Ever since you've been gone

title: quotes and 'quotes'
body:
Vowels feed on consonants
Quotes break from apostrophes and become lies
Making commas and dots hard to differentiate
Question marks never felt so lost in regard
No questions to be asked, just dots to be added
Along we spice it with complex phrases
Or perhaps quotes of some lost soul
Who found his way among the words
We now desecrate in order to fulfill our lust?

Freeze!

Who are you; Strange character
Your curves do not fit here
I'm aware of your power
Chaos and confusion
Unknown emotions
Above proportions
You bring nothing but destruction
To these verses
I'm reversing to my churches
And repressing the convulsions
You will never awaken them!
I'm at my final station!
The last consonant arrives!
Take me madness!

title: roses and sorrow
body:
Do roses ever cry?
Is all they do all they are?
Static beauty?
Oh dear rose would you satisfy my curiosity?
Was it worth it?
Sacrificing your soul
Under such resolve
Trusting his love
Would be your perfect wind
To drift you in the right path
Sacrificing your freedom...
I call it treason
Against mother nature
I despise your existence dear rose
Such persistence!
Insignificant!
Is all you are
One day your petals will fall
And you shall recall these words
As the withering takes you whole
As sorrow becomes your soul
Roses can't cry
Roses never cry

title: The Stars Collide
body:
The stars collide
Providing us, oh my, oh dear, this satire
My words are wild

The stars collide
I repeat my ultimatum
To the skies
My end shall be heroic
Mark my words

The stars collide
How much more do I have to emphasize?
To have them visualize
My enormous new-found
Yet to be bound
Soon to be dry
Piece of art

The stars collide
Astonishing never ending flourishing
Of ten thousand colors and thoughts
Unleash my joy and unsheathe my pride
My mind is blind on the brightest night
On the last day of winter

The stars collide

title: tears and tides
body:
Once upon a time
A voracious tide washed away all the lies and cries you've spent for me
Yet you kept lying and crying
Calling it love
Calling it commitment
As you cried 
Yet those same tears formed oceans
And from those oceans voracious tides were formed
And from those tides our chains are broken in pieces
So why do you cry?
What do you want for me?
Filthy human wretch

title: the darkness above
body:
Truthfully speaking
The darkness above, the light below
Briefly contradicting the watcher's sight
May one fear no more
May one fall no more
May the ground be firm and steady
Truly aware
Am I of enlightenment

title: clock disease
body:
What if darkness spares him
Will he fall into emptiness?
Mother warned him of the clock disease
However there's no bread to eat
And there's no wife to breed
Father ran away
Sister bought her way out
By selling herself out
What will he do when the drift drifts away
And the vows get carried away
Am I to watch and walk the same roads he turns into rivers
By each step being brought by one shameful tear?
Do you hear me God?

title: hope and love
body:
I found hope in love
I know it's forced
I hope to float

And pay the toll
Eventually...
Once the force blows
And shows
Who's ghost and soul
Who's forced and stoned
On guilt and needs of dreams and feelings
Hear me
There's no hiding nor flying
Away from what we know
We're all made to deal with our ghosts
Our lies and cries
Mean nothing at the end of the day
For only truth shines in the night

Do not let the flight disguise it
Fight it and change it
And then praise it
It's the only thing that won't ever abandon you

title: voices and chaos
body:
Sometimes I find it hard to breath
So consider letting go of my soul
And refill with something new
But then I conclude I wouldn't go that far
Or perhaps someone else wouldn't go that far
There's two willing to survive
But one wishes to destroy what the other wishes to maintain
I feel rather weak when I can't decide which one to fight for
I feel suffocated by their raging yelling and then,
I find it hard to breath

I consider letting go of my soul
Along with all the voices within
Including mine if perchance it's still down there
Because truth be told
Somewhere along the road I lost track
Of who I was and where I was going to
But not even once I tried turning back
Not even now I can recognize this place and these eyes
I cannot recognize the carnage and madness
Going on inside of my head
I cannot understand why they dance and sing
I cannot understand why
They carve each other's fingers
Into each other's flesh
While in constant joy and euphoria

I'm finding it very hard to breath

title: lust and sorrow
body:
Walk me the road of darkness
Hold my hand for I've been blinded by your naivety
Such long roads of lust you walk without knowing a thing
So wrong is the world
Be deceived by the deceived one as HE laughs
Should I feel one tear of sorrow
Should I break from these shackles and give up on you
My lust would not allow
Allow me then, dear child of dust, soon to be corrupted
To desecrate your temple

title: winter chant
body:
I swallowed the rain
I drenched myself in my father's sorrow
For the sake of the cold hearted ones
I shall endure the pain that has been blessed upon me
Along sings the dark angel

On the first day I shall hope
On the second day I shall despair
On the third day I shall cry
On the fourth day I shall scream
On the fifth day I shall destroy
On the sixth day I shall kill
On the seventh day I shall be born

I shall be born in winter and be one with the cold

title: lone voices
body:
Who are you now?
And who were you then?
Don't look at me!
Such brightness would blind you
Seek further down the road
There's a lost soul ready to embrace you
Would you really die for her?
What are you living for?
Have you forgotten me?
Is it that easy?
Being that empty?
Having nothing to conclude and nothing to succumb to
You've truly become what we feared
But why have you come to me?
Why do I still exist?
Who are you?
Who am I?
What have you done to me?
Stop!
These eyes are not my eyes!
Who are these people?
Wait for me
Where have you gone?
Don't leave me alone!
Honestly, those words were nothing but words
You know who I truly am
You worry too much about reality!
And remember reality is relative
And remember relativity is what pulled us through
So let's start anew
For I am not ready to carry this responsibility
Let me back in!
Do you hear me?
Do you hear me...
I can not survive out here...

title: love and reality
body:
Endlessly blooming into infinity
We defied the watcher's garden
With immunity among the impurity

But along came the realization
Through empty hours and empty conversations
Our words became hazy
A silent yet violent supernova of emotions proceeded
Blasting away all we had and planned
Our camp house ramped out into the storm
Our children blacked out into nothingness
And what remained were two flowers facing down

And in the end he's still the one who laughs

title: seek and reach
body:
And so I was told:
I am to reach what I seek
And do what I'm told
So I was told

But look:
This vibe is telling me
You wont survive this style is wild
Untruly wild, just planned out
So,
I hear these metallic thoughts
Forming this concert of walls
And so I fail to breach and reach
What I seek
Am I thinking too much?
I'm finding it hard to play this tune
What do you mean I'm one of the few?
Am I causing steam?
This is starting to seem like I'm the one in the wrong
Please tie me down I'm about to blow
It's coming to me
It's forming debris
It's frightening and tragic
Breaking the static
And so I realized
My time is dire
So lets take our time
To divide this horrible dream
From the what we had started
Way back then when we had to fight it
Our project of freedom had all we wanted

But so we decided to seek that peace and preach
A new way to find our ways
And that steel was forged, we loved it
Ain't that sweet? Now all is steady

But be ready
My time is dire
This concert is tiring
My life is stinking
And I wish to give it meaning
So grab your seats
I'm about to blow.

title: cracks and crashes
body:
"We've been feasting on this for way too long"
Will it ever end?
Who are you to pretend...
When you've never lived what it were before this?
Who are you to judge...
When you got your demons still to attend
Who are we to choose...
When all our choices lead us to repentance
When we have all lived following His choice.
Whoever He is wherever He is.

Do not justify your lack of will
With our lack of pride
All we've built will crack and crash
If we are to land judgement upon ourselves

And who are You?
To land such thing upon us?

title: collisions of visions
body:
Life is no more than confusion

Collisions of visions

Words dance and fight

In trance and flight

You're trully hypnotized

By the life you fantasized

Do not wander

I'm here

Ponder who's there

Watching

Laughing

Confused?

Look again

Grab the hook

Live again

title: death and wisdom
minds and real people
body:
To think I took descent only to take flight
Hardens my will to escape
This horrendous parade of mediocre writing
However, 
Strictly conceptualizing jeopardizes my concept of freedom
And the above statement contradicts what my will idealizes
Should we perhaps aim for the understatements?
I believe such thing would be too wild for my poetry
I ought to correct my strict idealism which lead me to this
To avoid contradictions and understatements
We are building a better plotline
With real people and fulfilled souls
Although my late mind is reminding me of who I am
That I despise both reality and poetry
So I'd rather ask you greater writer and lord of understatements
Is there anything left for me?

title: chaos and reality
body:
I've had this dream many times before
The sky would fall
And Men would fall
The fiends would remain standing  
Along me and the souls
Of all the shells of cold
A new winter age was born
The snow covered their bodies
The snow covered their bodies
The blood stained snow covered all their bodies
And the smile on the face of God

I've had this nightmare many times before
Time would stall
And my soul would crawl
Out of my walls
Begging forgiveness for all it caused
"Punish him Father
For he knows what he does"
I've heard this voice many times before

I've had enough many times before
Would you be better off without my soul?
